00534 
00546                 static void threadUpdate()
00547                 {
00548                         while(!mShuttingDown)
00549                         {
00550                                 OgreOggSoundManager::getSingleton().processQueuedSounds();
00551                                 OgreOggSoundManager::getSingleton().updateBuffers();
00552                                 mUpdateThread->yield();
00553                         }
00554                 }
00555 
00556 #endif
